channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outstanding 10+ portholes at the end of Queens Road, 22nd June
item.description:
There are outstanding (not completed by your Contactors as originally reported on the 16th May 2025) about 10 potholes at the end of Queens Road and Upper Wickham Lane, near the Tesco Express. The potholes have been there January 2025 and they are started to get bigger and bigger as times goes on. This will become a heath and safely issue for people crossing the road. Also as the potholes gets larger, this will cause damages to cars travelling in and out of the Queens Road. Please get the 10+ potholes as shown in the photos fixed using tarmac. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Road, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Urgent - Massive Amount of Fly-Tipped Rubbish, 22nd June
item.description:

item.title: Property not taking responsibility, 22nd June
